classes module¶

class classes.Course(id, name)[source]¶

Bases: object

This is a class used to represent a course. :param type id: str :param id: id of the course :param type name: str :param name: name of the course

add_student(student)[source]¶

function used to add a student to the list of enrolled student

Parameters:

  • student (type) – :class:Student

  • student – student that wants to get enrolled in the course

Returns:

return: None

class classes.Instructor(id, name, age, email)[source]¶

Bases: Person

This a class used to represent a instructor. It inherits the basic attributes and methods of a instructor from the Person :param type id: str :param id: id of the instructor :param type name: str :param name: name of the instructor :param type age: int, must be positive :param age: age of the instructor :param type email: str, must contain @ character :param email: email address of the instructor

assign_course(course)[source]¶

Method used to assign the instructor to a course :param type course: Course :param course: course to which the instructor is assigned to

class classes.Person(name, age, email)[source]¶

Bases: object

This is a simple class representing a person. It is used as a super class for the Student and Instructor classes.

Parameters:

  • name (type) – str

  • name – name of the person

  • age (type) – int, must be positive

  • age – age of the person

  • email (type) – str, must contain @ character

  • email – email address of the person

introduce()[source]¶

Returns a string in which the person tells her name and age

class classes.School(json_file='')[source]¶

Bases: object

This is a complex class used to represent an entire school. It makes use of the simple classes :class:Student, :class:Instructor, :class:Course

Parameters:

  • json_file (type) – str, defaults to empty string

  • json_file – the location of the json file to load the data from into the class

add_course_to_school(id, name)[source]¶

Adds a course to the school system. Performs necessary checks on the inputs. Creates a :class:Course object to store the data in it then places it in the courses list

Parameters:

  • id (type) – str

  • id – id of the course

  • name (type) – str

  • name – name of the course

Returns:

return: the created course :rtype: :class:Course

add_instructor_to_school(id, name, age, email)[source]¶

Adds an instructor to the school system. Performs necessary checks on the inputs. Creates a :class:Instructor object to store the data in it then places it in the instructors list :param type id: str :param id: id of the instructor :param type name: str :param name: name of the instructor :param type age: int, must be positive :param age: age of the instructor :param type email: str, must contain @ character :param email: email address of the instructor

Returns:

return: the created instructor :rtype: :class:Instructor

add_student_to_school(id, name, age, email)[source]¶

Adds a student to the school system. Performs necessary checks on the inputs. Creates a :class:Student object to store the data in it then places it in the students list

Parameters:

  • id (type) – str

  • id – id of the student

  • name (type) – str

  • name – name of the student

  • age (type) – int, must be positive

  • age – age of the student

  • email (type) – str, must contain @ character

  • email – email address of the student

Returns:

return: the created student :rtype: :class:Student

save_to_json()[source]¶

Saves any modified data into the json file. If json file specified at the start, data will be saved into it, otherwise, data will be saved in output_file.json file.

Returns:

return: None

class classes.Student(id, name, age, email)[source]¶

Bases: Person

This a class used to represent a student. It inherits the basic attributes and methods of a student from the Person :param type id: str :param id: id of the student :param type name: str :param name: name of the student :param type age: int, must be positive :param age: age of the student :param type email: str, must contain @ character :param email: email address of the student

Method used to register a student in a course

Parameters:

  • course – course to which the student want to register
